Statement.description: off-boarding remote user with cache domain credentials The procedure calls PowerShell script that removes cached domain credentials. Version: 0.2 Author: Proserv Team - VS
Statement.name: ExecuteShellCommand

Parameter.name: Command
Parameter.value: Powershell.exe -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "[string[]]$CmdOut = cmdkey /list | ForEach-Object { $_.Trim() | Write-Output } | Where-Object { -not [string]::IsNullOrEmpty( $_ ) }; $Creds = @(); foreach ( $Item in $CmdOut ) { if ($Item.Contains('Target: ')) { $Target = $Item.Replace('Target: ', '') }; if ($Item.Contains('Type: ')) { $TT = $Item.Replace('Type: ', ''); $Creds += [PSCustomObject]@{ Target = $Target; Type = $TT} } }; $Creds = $Creds | Where-Object {$_.Type -match '^Domain'}; foreach ( $Item in $Creds ) { cmdkey /delete:$($Item.Target) }"
